Sentencas: The effect of crystal structure of yttria- (YSZ) and scandia-stabilized zirconia (ScSZ) in nickel-based SOFC anodes was investigated in relation with carbon deposition and oxidation behavior in methane fuel.
Titulo: Effects of crystal Structure of yttria- and scandia-stabilized zirconia in nickel-based SOFC anodes on carbon deposition and oxidation behavior

Sentencas: The lattice parameter of the zirconia decreased by the dissolution of 1-2 mol%Ni to YSZ and ScSZ.
Titulo: Effects of crystal Structure of yttria- and scandia-stabilized zirconia in nickel-based SOFC anodes on carbon deposition and oxidation behavior

Sentencas: For Ni-doped ScSZ, the lattice parameter of the zirconia increased by the Ni dissolution, and the crystal structure of the zirconia was modified after reduction treatment.
Titulo: Effects of crystal Structure of yttria- and scandia-stabilized zirconia in nickel-based SOFC anodes on carbon deposition and oxidation behavior

Sentencas: New finer Ni particles were formed around original Ni grains accompanied by the decrease in Ni solubility to ScSZ after reduction treatment.
Titulo: Effects of crystal Structure of yttria- and scandia-stabilized zirconia in nickel-based SOFC anodes on carbon deposition and oxidation behavior

Sentencas: Carbon deposition was initiated near the boundary between Ni particles and YSZ (or ScSZ)
Titulo: Effects of crystal Structure of yttria- and scandia-stabilized zirconia in nickel-based SOFC anodes on carbon deposition and oxidation behavior
Effects of crystal Structure of yttria- and scandia-stabilized zirconia in nickel-based SOFC anodes on carbon deposition and oxidation behavior

Sentencas: Furthermore, the rod-shaped carbon was observed to grow from the new finer Ni particles on the ScSZ substrate.
Titulo: Effects of crystal Structure of yttria- and scandia-stabilized zirconia in nickel-based SOFC anodes on carbon deposition and oxidation behavior

Sentencas: On the other hand, a large amount of amorphous carbon was promoted to be deposited on Ni-YSZ cermet at a high temperature of 1273 K.
Titulo: Effects of crystal Structure of yttria- and scandia-stabilized zirconia in nickel-based SOFC anodes on carbon deposition and oxidation behavior

Sentencas: The amorphous carbon, however, was oxidized at lower temperatures than graphite.
Titulo: Effects of crystal Structure of yttria- and scandia-stabilized zirconia in nickel-based SOFC anodes on carbon deposition and oxidation behavior

Sentencas: The carbon deposition and oxidation behavior was strongly affected by the morphology and crystallinity of deposited carbon.
Titulo: Effects of crystal Structure of yttria- and scandia-stabilized zirconia in nickel-based SOFC anodes on carbon deposition and oxidation behavior
